languages.text: "Прости меня. И благодарю за урок. Я слишком привыкла полагаться на наставления Висиря, и препятствие, о котором он не учил меня, заставило меня вновь искать совета на стороне". {n}Кибелла коротко касается вашей груди.{/n} "Спасибо, что вернул меня себе, {name}".

traits.locale_text: "Прости меня. И благодарю за урок. Я слишком привыкла полагаться на уроки Висиря, и препятствие, о котором он не учил меня, заставило меня вновь искать совета на стороне..." {n}Кибелла коротко касается вашей груди, ее голос едва слышен.{/n} "Спасибо, что вернул меня себе, {name}".

languages.text: "Forgive me. And thank you for this lesson. I am so used to relying on the Vizsier's teachings that, when faced with an obstacle he did not warn me about, my instinct is to seek advice from others." {n}Kibellah touches your chest.{/n} "Thank you for letting me pick myself up, {name}."
languages.original_text: "Прости меня. И благодарю за урок. Я слишком привыкла полагаться на наставления Висиря, и препятствие, о котором он не учил меня, заставило меня вновь искать совета на стороне". {n}Кибелла коротко касается вашей груди.{/n} "Спасибо, что вернул меня себе, {name}".

traits.locale_text: "Forgive me. And thank you for this lesson. I am so used to relying on the Vizsier's teachings that, when faced with an obstacle he hadn't warned me about, my instinct was to look for someone's advice." {n}Kibellah touches your chest.{/n} "Thank you for letting me pick myself up, {name}."

"Forgive me. And thank you for this lesson. I am so used to relying on the Vizsier's teachings that, when faced with an obstacle he hadn't warned me about, my instinct was to look for someone's advice." {n}Kibellah touches your chest.{/n} "Thank you for letting me pick myself up, {name}."

"Forgive me. And thank you for this lesson. I am so used to relying on the Vizsier's teachings that, when faced with an obstacle he did not warn me about, my instinct is to seek advice from others." {n}Kibellah touches your chest.{/n} "Thank you for letting me pick myself up, {name}."

"Forgive me. And thank you for this lesson. I am so used to relying on the Vizsier's teachings that, when faced with an obstacle he did not warn me about, my instinct is to seek advice from others." {n}Kibellah touches your chest.{/n} "Thank you for letting me pick myself up, {name}."

languages.text: "Vergebt mir. Und danke für diese Lektion. Ich bin es gewohnt, mich auf die Lehren des Wesirs zu verlassen. Wenn ich also vor einem Hindernis stehe, vor dem er mich nicht gewarnt hat, ist mein Instinkt, Rat von anderen einzuholen." {n}Kibellah berührt deine Brust.{/n} "Danke, dass Ihr mir geholfen habt, mich wieder aufzurappeln, {name}."
languages.original_text: "Forgive me. And thank you for this lesson. I am so used to relying on the Vizsier's teachings that, when faced with an obstacle he did not warn me about, my instinct is to seek advice from others." {n}Kibellah touches your chest.{/n} "Thank you for letting me pick myself up, {name}."

traits.locale_text: "Vergebt mir. Und danke für diese Lektion. Ich bin es gewohnt, mich auf die Lehren des Wesirs zu verlassen. Wenn ich also vor einem Hindernis stehe, vor dem er mich nicht gewarnt hat, ist mein Instinkt, Rat von anderen einzuholen." {n}Kibellah berührt deine Brust.{/n} "Danke, dass Ihr mir geholfen habt, mich wieder aufzurappeln, {name}."

languages.text: «Mis disculpas. Y gracias por esta lección. Estoy tan habituada a confiar en las enseñanzas del Visir que, al encontrar un obstáculo inesperado, mi primer instinto es recurrir al consejo ajeno». {n}Kibellah toca tu pecho.{/n} «Gracias por dejarme recobrar la compostura, {name}».
languages.original_text: "Forgive me. And thank you for this lesson. I am so used to relying on the Vizsier's teachings that, when faced with an obstacle he did not warn me about, my instinct is to seek advice from others." {n}Kibellah touches your chest.{/n} "Thank you for letting me pick myself up, {name}."

traits.locale_text: «Mis disculpas. Y gracias por esta lección. Estoy tan habituada a confiar en las enseñanzas del Visir que, al encontrar un obstáculo inesperado, mi primer instinto es recurrir al consejo ajeno». {n}Kibellah toca tu pecho.{/n} «Gracias por dejarme recobrar la compostura, {name}».

languages.text: 「ごめんなさい。そしてこの教訓をありがとう。私はヴィジールの教えに頼りすぎていて、彼が警告してくれていなかった障害に直面した時、私の本能は他の人に助言を求めるようになってしまったの」{n}キベラがあなたの胸に触れる。{/n}「自力で立ち直らせてくれてありがとう、{name}」
languages.original_text: "Forgive me. And thank you for this lesson. I am so used to relying on the Vizsier's teachings that, when faced with an obstacle he did not warn me about, my instinct is to seek advice from others." {n}Kibellah touches your chest.{/n} "Thank you for letting me pick myself up, {name}."

traits.locale_text: 「ごめんなさい。そしてこの教訓をありがとう。私はヴィジールの教えに頼りすぎていて、彼が警告してくれていなかった障害に直面した時、私の本能は他の人に助言を求めるようになってしまったの」{n}キベラがあなたの胸に触れる。{/n}「自力で立ち直らせてくれてありがとう、{name}」

languages.text: “请原谅我，也谢谢你给我上了这一课。我已经习惯了依赖宿老的教诲，所以当我遇到他没有预见过的障碍时，我会本能般地向别人寻求建议。”{n}绮贝菈触碰着你的胸口。{/n}“谢谢你让我靠自己的力量振作起来，{name}。”
languages.original_text: "Forgive me. And thank you for this lesson. I am so used to relying on the Vizsier's teachings that, when faced with an obstacle he did not warn me about, my instinct is to seek advice from others." {n}Kibellah touches your chest.{/n} "Thank you for letting me pick myself up, {name}."

traits.locale_text: “请原谅我，也谢谢你给我上了这一课。我已经习惯了依赖宿老的教诲，所以当我遇到他没有预见过的障碍时，我会本能般地向别人寻求建议。”{n}绮贝菈触碰着你的胸口。{/n}“谢谢你让我靠自己的力量振作起来，{name}。”

languages.text: « Pardonnez-moi. Et merci pour cette leçon. Comme je me suis toujours reposée sur les enseignements du vizir, j'ai tendance à demander conseil à d'autres chaque fois que je rencontre un obstacle auquel il ne m'a pas préparée. » {n}Kibellah pose une main sur votre torse.{/n} « Merci de m'avoir aidée à me ressaisir, {name}. »
languages.original_text: "Forgive me. And thank you for this lesson. I am so used to relying on the Vizsier's teachings that, when faced with an obstacle he did not warn me about, my instinct is to seek advice from others." {n}Kibellah touches your chest.{/n} "Thank you for letting me pick myself up, {name}."

traits.locale_text: « Pardonnez-moi. Et merci pour cette leçon. Comme je me suis toujours reposée sur les enseignements du vizir, j'ai tendance à demander conseil à d'autres chaque fois que je rencontre un obstacle auquel il ne m'a pas préparée. » {n}Kibellah pose une main sur votre torse.{/n} « Merci de m'avoir aidée à me ressaisir, {name}. »

languages.text: "Beni affet. Verdiğin ders için de teşekkür ederim. Vezir'in öğretilerine bel bağlamaya o kadar aşinayım ki beni uyarmadığı türden bir engelle karşılaştığımda içgüdüsel olarak başkalarından tavsiye istiyorum." {n}Kibellah göğsüne dokunuyor.{/n} "Kendimi toparlamama müsaade ettiğin için teşekkür ederim {name}."
languages.original_text: "Forgive me. And thank you for this lesson. I am so used to relying on the Vizsier's teachings that, when faced with an obstacle he did not warn me about, my instinct is to seek advice from others." {n}Kibellah touches your chest.{/n} "Thank you for letting me pick myself up, {name}."
